comment.text: This translation key is used to display the action label "HotkeysActions" as a heading in a UI component. The text will be displayed above an actions block, guiding users on what they can expect to see when taking action on selected items.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Seçilmiş elementlər üzrə addımın atılması' is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the natural flow of 'Taking action on selected items.' It sounds slightly awkward in Azerbaijani. A more natural phrasing would better convey the meaning.
While 'Seçilmiş elementlər' is understandable, 'Seçilmişlər' is often preferred for a more concise and idiomatic expression when referring to selected items in a user interface context.

The translation "Durchführung von Handlungen zu ausgewählten Elementen" is a literal translation and doesn't quite capture the intended meaning of 'Taking action on selected items'. It sounds overly formal and slightly awkward.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation might be "Aktionen für ausgewählte Elemente ausführen" or "Ausgewählten Elementen Aktionen zuweisen" or simply "Aktionen für ausgewählte Elemente".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Toimintojen suoritus valituille kohteille' is a literal translation and doesn't convey the natural meaning of 'Taking action on selected items' in Finnish. It sounds overly formal and technical.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural and accurate translation would be something like 'Toimenpiteet valituille kohteille' or 'Valittujen kohteiden toiminnot'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Prise de mesures sur les éléments sélectionnés' is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Taking action on selected items' in the context of hotkeys. It sounds overly formal and technical. A more natural translation would be something like 'Effectuer une action sur les éléments sélectionnés' or 'Agir sur les éléments sélectionnés'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Effectuer une action sur les éléments sélectionnés

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Ընտրված միավորների նկատմամբ միջոցներ ձեռք առնել" is a very literal and somewhat awkward translation of "Taking action on selected items." It's not idiomatic Armenian. " միավորների" could be interpreted as 'units' instead of 'items'. The phrase "ձեռք առնել" (to take/assume) feels overly formal for this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural and idiomatic translation might be something like "Ընտրված իրերի վրա գործել" (Gorgel vrac edgnir ireri) which translates to 'Act on selected items'. Or "Ընտրված իրերի հետ գործել" (Edgnir ireri het gorgel) - 'Act with selected items'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "선택된 항목에 작업 실행하기" is technically correct, but it's a bit verbose and formal for a hotkey panel action. A more natural and concise translation would be more appropriate.

The translation 'ປະຕິບັດລາຍການທີ່ເລືອກ' while technically understandable, doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'Taking action on selected items'. 'ປະຕິບັດ' implies execution or performing a task *on* the items, whereas 'Taking action' is more general and can include various forms of interaction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like 'ດໍາເນີນການກັບລາຍການທີ່ເລືອກ' (dam-nern-gaan gap lai-gaan tee leuaak) which more closely reflects 'Taking action on selected items' or 'ກະດໍາການກັບລາຍການທີ່ເລືອກ' (ka-dam-gaan gap lai-gaan tee leuaak).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Notiek darbību veikšana ar atlasītajiem vienumiem' is a literal translation and doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'Taking action on selected items' naturally in Latvian. It's awkward and verbose.
The phrase 'Izvēlēto vienumu darbības' is missing the colon that is present in the English version after 'HotkeysPanel:HotkeysActions'.

The translation "A atuar sobre os itens selecionados" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Taking action on selected items." 'Atuar' implies acting as a character or performing a role, not taking action *on* items.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A sugestão é reformular a tradução para algo como "Realizar ações nos itens selecionados" ou "Executar ações nos itens selecionados".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "තේරූ අථක සඳහා ක්‍රියාමාර්ගයක් ගැනීම" is not the most natural or accurate translation of "Taking action on selected items". "අථක" isn't the standard term for 'items' in this context. It can be perceived as slightly archaic or unusual.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural translation would be something like "තේරීම් මත ක්‍රියාමාර්ග ගැනීම" or "මැුselect කළ අයිතෙම මත ක්‍රියාමාර්ග ගැනීම".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "අථක" isn't strictly incorrect, it’s uncommon in modern Sinhala usage. "අයිතෙම" (aitema) is a more common transliteration for 'items' and might be more suitable depending on the desired level of formality.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using "අයිතෙම" (aitema) instead of "අථක" if a more accessible term is desired.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Предузимање радње на одабране предмете' is a bit literal and could be improved for naturalness. 'Preuzimanje akcije' would be a more common and natural phrasing for 'Taking action'.

The translation 'Preduzimanje radnje na odabrane predmete' is a literal translation but doesn't quite capture the natural English phrasing of 'Taking action on selected items'. It sounds a bit clunky in Serbian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'Izvršavanje akcije na odabranim predmetima' or 'Akcija na odabranim predmetima' for a more fluent and idiomatic Serbian translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Seçilen öğeler üzerinde işlem yapılıyor' is a literal translation of 'Taking action on selected items' and doesn't convey the same meaning in a natural Turkish way. It implies the action is currently happening, whereas the English phrase refers to the functionality of a panel or option.

The translation "对选定的项目采取操作" is technically correct but lacks the nuance and flow of the English phrase "Taking action on selected items." It sounds slightly formal and less natural in Chinese.  A more idiomatic translation would better convey the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 考虑使用更自然的表达，例如“对所选项目执行操作” or “对选中的项目进行操作”。
